item.title: SYSTEM_USER and it’s limitations
item.author: hello@richinsql.com (Rich)
item.description: Recently I came across a stored procedure I had written a few years ago, when I first started as a developer I was given a task where I needed to write a stored procedure that allowed users to update an underlying table but also track the changes, what data had been amended and who amended it, to make it work I made use of an audit table to capture them details around which users were doing what.
